doṣāṇām kuhanā ādīnām pañcānām aniṣevaṇāt

prāṇi dhānya dhana ādīnām varjyānām a pratigrahāt
bhaikṣa aṅgānām nisṛṣṭānām niyatānām pratigrahāt
parituṣṭaḥ śuciḥ mañjuḥ caukṣayā jīva saṃpadā
kuryāḥ duḥkha pratīkāram yāvat eva vimuktaye
karmaṇaḥ hi yathā dṛṣṭāt kāya vāc prabhavāt api

gṛhasthena hi duḥśodhā dṛṣṭiḥ vividha dṛṣṭinā

original: asya nāśena naiva syāt pravrajyā na gṛhasthatā ||19 ||
analyzed: asya nāśena nā eva syāt pravrajyā na gṛhastha tā
tasmāt cāritra sampannaḥ brahmacaryam idam cara
aṇu mātreṣu adyeṣu bhaya darśī dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: śīlamāsthāya vartante sarvā hi śreyasi kriyāḥ |
analyzed: śīlam āsthāya vartante sarvāḥ hi śreyasi kriyāḥ
sthāna ādyāni iva kāryāṇi pratiṣṭhāya vasundharām
mokṣasya upaniṣad saumya vairāgyam iti gṛhyatām
vairāgyasya api saṃvedaḥ saṃvidaḥ jñāna darśanam
jñānasya upaniṣad ca eva samādhiḥ upadhāryatām
samādheḥ api upaniṣad sukham śārīra mānasam
praśrabdhiḥ kāya manasaḥ sukhasya upaniṣad parā
praśrabdheḥ api upaniṣad prītiḥ api avagamyatām
tathā prīteḥ upaniṣad prāmodyam paramam matam
prāmodyasya api a hṛllekhaḥ kukṛteṣu akṛteṣu vā
a hṛllekhasya manasaḥ śīlam tu upaniṣad śuci
atas śīlam nayati agryam iti śīlam viśodhaya
śīlanāt śīlam iti uktam śīlanam sevanāt api
sevanam tad nideśāt ca nideśaḥ ca tad āśrayāt

original: śīlaṃ hi śaraṇaṃ saubhya kāntāra iva daiśikaḥ |
analyzed: śīlam hi śaraṇam saubhya kāntāre iva daiśikaḥ

original: pitraṃ bandhuśca rakṣā ca dhanaṃ ca balameva ca ||28 ||
analyzed: bandhuḥ ca rakṣā ca dhanam ca balam eva ca
yatas śīlam atas saumya śīlam saṃskartum arhasi
etat sthānam atha anye ca mokṣa ārambheṣu yoginām
tatas smṛtim adhiṣṭhāya capalāni svabhāvataḥ
indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ nivārayitum arhasi
bhetavyam na tathā śatroḥ na agneḥ na aheḥ na ca aśaneḥ
indriyebhyaḥ yathā svebhyaḥ taiḥ ajasram hi hanyate

original: dviṣadbhiḥ śatrubhiḥ kaścit kadācit pīḍyate na vā |
analyzed: dviṣadbhiḥ śatrubhiḥ kaścid kadācid pīḍyate na vā

original: indriyairbādhyate sarvaḥ sarvatra ca sadaiva ca ||32 ||
analyzed: indriyaiḥ bādhyate sarvaḥ sarvatra ca sadā eva ca
na ca prayāti narakam śatru prabhṛtibhiḥ hataḥ
kṛṣyate tatra nighnaḥ tu capalaiḥ indriyaiḥ hataḥ

original: hanyamānasya tairduḥkhaṃ hārdaṃ bhavati vā na vā |
analyzed: hanyamānasya taiḥ duḥkham hārdam bhavati vā na vā
indriyaiḥ bādhyamānasya hārdam śārīram eva ca
saṃkalpa viṣa digdhāḥ hi pañca indriya mayāḥ śarāḥ
cintā puṅkhāḥ rati phalāḥ viṣaya ākāśa gocarāḥ
manuṣya hariṇān ghnanti kāma vyādha īritāḥ hṛdi

original: vihanyante yadi na te tataḥ patanti taiḥ kṣatāḥ ||36 ||
analyzed: vihanyante yadi na te tatas patanti taiḥ kṣatāḥ
niyama ajira saṃsthena dhairya kārmuka dhāriṇā
nipatantaḥ nivāryāḥ te mahatā smṛti varmaṇā
indriyāṇām upaśamāt arīṇām nigrahāt iva

original: sukhaṃ svapiti vāste vā yatra tatra gatoddhavaḥ ||38 ||
analyzed: sukham svapiti vā āste vā yatra tatra gata uddhavaḥ
teṣām hi satatam loke viṣayān abhikāṅkṣatām
saṃvid nā eva asti kārpaṇyāt śunām āśāvatām iva
viṣayaiḥ indriya grāmaḥ na tṛptim adhigacchati
ajasram pūryamāṇaḥ api samudraḥ salilaiḥ iva
avaśyam gocare sve sve vartitavyam iha indriyaiḥ
nimittam tatra na grāhyam anuvyañjanam eva ca
ālokya cakṣuṣā rūpam dhātu mātre vyavasthitaḥ

original: strī veti puruṣo veti na kalpayitumarhasi ||42 ||
analyzed: strī vā iti puruṣaḥ vā iti na kalpayitum arhasi
saced strī puruṣa grāhaḥ kvacid vidyeta kaścan
śubhataḥ keśa danta ādīn na anuprasthātum arhasi

original: nāpaneyaṃ tataḥ kiṃcit prakṣepyaṃ nāpi kiñcana |
analyzed: na apaneyam tatas kiṃcid prakṣepyam nā api kiñcana

original: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ yādṛśaṃ ca yathā ca yat ||44 ||
analyzed: draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam yādṛśam ca yathā ca yat
evam te paśyataḥ tattvam śaśvat indriya gocaram
bhaviṣyati pada sthānam na abhidhyā daurmanasyayoḥ
abhidhyā priya rūpeṇa hanti kāma ātmakam jagat
ariḥ mitra mukhena iva priya vāc kaluṣa āśayaḥ
daurmanasya abhidhānaḥ tu pratighaḥ viṣaya āśritaḥ
moha ādyena anuvṛtena paratra iha ca hanyate
anurodha virodhābhyām śita uṣṇābhyām iva arditaḥ
śarma nā āpnoti na śreyaḥ cala indriyam atas jagat
na indriyam viṣaye tāvat pravṛttam api sajjate
yāvat na manasaḥ tatra parikalpaḥ pravartate

original: indhane sati vāyau ca yathā jvalati pāvakaḥ |
